= updatevarfile =

== Format ==
cg updatevarfile ?options? varfile resultfile dbdir

== Summary ==
Ths command adds ref and alt fields to a variation file that misses them, and fills them.
If a ref fields is already present, its contents will be checked, and an error given if there
is a difference with the genome sequence in dbdir.
alt wil be updated if already present if alleleSeq* fields are present in the variant file.

== Arguments ==
; **srcfile**: variations file
; **dstfile**: resulting variations file
; **dbdir**: database directory with reference sequence, etc.

== Options ==
; **-f**: force overwrite of ref if different from genome sequence in **dbdir**, instead of giving error

== Category ==
Convert
